QuestData.Title: A Line Unbroken
QuestData.Description:
When we regrouped after their initial attack, we numbered three less. You can fight, and we must plan our defense should these cursed yaungol attack again.
If you would help us, grant our fallen comrades their last rites, and recover their armor. You will find their bodies to the west, near the gate.
And try to keep the birds off them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Lay Shado-Master Zhiyao, Liu of the Thousand Blows and Shiya Boldblade to rest.
QuestData.CompletionText: Our comrades, are they at rest?
QuestData.RewardText: Good. I will see to it that the armor is returned to their pupils.

Objectives.Objective: Shado-Master Zhiyao Released From his Oath
Liu of the Thousand Blows Released From his Oath
Shiya Boldblade Released From her Oath
